Raising the federal smoking age to 21 is an important step toward keeping harmful tobacco products out of our children’s hands. Utah was one of the first states to enact such a law and I'm proud to join my colleagues in introducing federal legislation that follows Utah's lead. https://twitter.com/SenToddYoung/status/1123334172368605184 QT @SenToddYoung Today I introduced the Tobacco to 21 Act with @SenBrianSchatz, @SenatorRomney & @SenatorDurbin. Our bipartisan bill would raise the legal smoking & vaping age to 21, and would save more than 220,000 lives. #Tobacco21 https://www.young.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/senators-young-schatz-durbin-romney-introduce-bipartisan-legislation-to-raise-smoking-vaping-age-to-21 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D5bhMgpWkAAzj-b.jpg
